thread.title: Warren Buffett: Why hedge funds fail
thread.title_full: Warren Buffett: Why hedge funds fail - MarketWatch

author: MarketWatch
title: Warren Buffett: Why hedge funds fail
text:
MARKETWATCH FRONT PAGE You might be surprised to see occasional headlines bemoaning the poor performance of hedge funds versus the market indexes. Not Warren Buffett. See full story.
Why men are threatened by smart women A new study suggests men might not want to date women who are smarter than them. See full story.
Nevada bans fantasy sports sites including FanDuel, DraftKings Nevada had banned—at least temporarily—fantasy sports sites including FanDuel and DraftKings, making it the first state to limit activities since a scandal over insider betting erupted. See full story.
Why the federal government now holds nearly 50% of all residential mortgages Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac’s holdings have soared as private investors avoid buying mortgages from banks. See full story.
Job openings level in August comes back to Earth The gap between available jobs and hiring narrowed in August, in another sign the once vibrant jobs market is slowing down. See full story.
MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE China, where driving a Buick and drinking a PBR are signs you’ve made it. See full story.
